website_summaries.verdict: A gun maintenance kit with its own unique cleaning system.
pros: Comprised of high quality tools and pieces so there's no shortage of useful cleaning inventory to choose from
Works well for a variety of firearm types
If you don't like cleaning your guns, this method may make life easier
cons: Unique cleaning system may not be for traditionalist
While it has a plethora of tools, it's missing some essential ones

customer_reviews.title: Everything you need to clean everything (well, maybe not a canon :) )
customer_reviews.text: Somewhat expensive, but overly complete with well made brushes of every caliber and cables. Obvious pride in attention to details - the shipping box lid is signed by the dozen staff responsible for each kit! Some have negatively commented on the nylon case. It is well made, excellent zippers, and since it is soft, it won't scratch or dent optics or firearms in the bag with it. They really have thought of everything. It includes a small "range" kit with all the tools needed if you don't want to carry the main bag to the range!
customer_reviews.author: SR

customer_reviews.title: Happy!
customer_reviews.text: I had purchased this as a Christmas gift for my lovely Fiance for his M&P shield along with his AR15, and he was ecstatic to have a gun cleaning kit for all types of arms from handguns to shotguns of all sizes. It comes with everything needed to get a gun clean, with a few purchases outside from the kit only to the liking of my fiance. The cleaning supplies feel of good quality, and the bore cleaners themselves feel of a good quality and heavy duty material vs the rod type cleaners. I am happy to have done my research and stuck with this brand and kit itself.
customer_reviews.author: Yvonne M.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality and options
customer_reviews.text: Excellent kit and thorough. Includes everything you need to clean a large variety of weapons. Does not include rifle length rods but instead has ropes. You may want to add a drop cloth/cleaning pad and/or extra rags. Includes CLP, patches, and small cloth. On the expensive end of the spectrum but well worth it if you have many calibers and shoot frequently.
customer_reviews.author: Eddie

customer_reviews.title: Best kit I've used
customer_reviews.text: Title says it all, I've had a few field Otis field kits over the years, and finally purchased the big kit. Best cleaning system I've ever used, I wish more local places carried extra patches and solvents. Also wouldve like to have seen this in a hard case over the soft case. But still awesome kit!
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Nilson

customer_reviews.title: WOW....
customer_reviews.text: When I first opened this, I thought something was missing, however, I was wrong. I found that this really is a 2 part pack. I found this out buy calling Otis. The lady on the phone was AMAZING!! Their customer service was out of this world, the BEST I've ever dealt with in my life. I have bought several of the small cleaning packs and now, I will buy more to give as Christmas gifts.
customer_reviews.author: vernon jones

customer_reviews.title: Great kit but be careful with the T-bars!
customer_reviews.text: This kit has everything that I will ever need, in particular I like the specialty attachments for .22 caliber. My only criticism is in regard to the t bar which inserts into the obstruction removal attachment, it works great but is VERY easy to lose track of. I intend on replacing them with something else that will fit in the corresponding holes, maybe paneling nails or something similar. There is a brief learning curve with the patches, however it is really quite simple once you get the hang of it
customer_reviews.author: Jon E. Bravo

customer_reviews.title: Poor functional use!
customer_reviews.text: The kit is without solid cleaning rods and very difficult to use. I am disabled and love shooting, but need to have a solid cleaning rod to clean shotguns, pistols and rifles. This company is requesting that I pay to ship this item back to them along with charging me a restocking fee. This is ridiculous for a product that I ordered on Amazon without having a chance to evaluate first and I will never order from this company again!
customer_reviews.author: dennis schlegel

customer_reviews.title: Everything you need and then some.....
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome cleaning kit. Otis is one of the best names in the industry and this kit has everything you need to care for all of your firearms. Depending on how many you have, it might be more than you need but if you do get it, with the exception of needing more lube/oil/patches as you use them, you will likely never need to buy another kit again.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: 5 Star Product
customer_reviews.text: 5 Star Product. I have attached photos of what the case looks like, how it comes shipped and everything included. Read the other 5 star top reviews for a detailed review on the product. This review is to provide photos.
customer_reviews.author: Kosuki07

customer_reviews.title: I'm an Otis fan!
customer_reviews.text: I believe the Otis system is the best cleaning system out there. I have had two tactical kits and finally decided to splurge on the elite. It is just a great system that can be used in the field, at the range or at home. Buy one and you wont regret it. I'm a long time hunter and the Otis system is the only cleaning system I use.
customer_reviews.author: Helton Jolly

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money, just buy it you won't be sorry
customer_reviews.text: I was really on the fence with this because of the cost. My cleaning gear was becoming a mess of stuff for several cheaper kits. Honestly I'm glad I made the purchase. This kit has everything you need, seriously for any caliber I can think of. Good quality solid product and I got to ditch the messy collection of random kits. Definitely worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Jason W.

customer_reviews.title: Great starter kit
customer_reviews.text: Arguably almost everything a firearm owner needs to clean an assortment of firearms the RIGHT way, bore to muzzle. No aluminum pushrods that will scratch the bore rifling. The face that this kit covers everything from a .17 caliber to a 12/10 gauge shotgun is incredible. This kit pays for itself very quickly if a person bought the supplies to clean 2 or 3 firearms individually. Highly Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: MRBeanJenn

customer_reviews.title: The gun cleaning kit to end all kit buying.
customer_reviews.text: Stop looking for cleaning kits and get this one. Well made, well put together, quality parts, and the bag zips and closes easily. And get this—the inside of the box lid was signed...not stamped...but signed with real Otis employee names. In sharpie. I was impressed by this level of “hey we are proud of our product and we hope you like it” That attitude shows in both the quality of this cleaning kit and the customer service with these guys.
customer_reviews.author: BillyRay

customer_reviews.title: There is nothing better to clean our firearms than Otis
customer_reviews.text: There is nothing better to clean our firearms than Otis. I have used the Otis system for years and finally broke down and bought the complete kit. Mainly because I don't like the rods used to clean shotguns. Yeah, I know that is what we have had for years. However, using the Otis on handguns and knowing how easy it is to clean a bore it made sense to change over to the Otis system for my shotguns. Expensive - yes but the last cleaning system you will ever need. I think that the US Military issues Otis to the troops so what does that say?
customer_reviews.author: MinnCanoeGuy

customer_reviews.title: Great cleaning kit
customer_reviews.text: I love this Otis Cleaning System kit. I am starting off my gun collection and didn't know what I may end up with so I wanted a comprehensive cleaning kit to handle it all. The barrel cleaning tools are great !!! There isn't too much that I'd change to the kit but I would probably add a large brass pick to help with some of the stubborn carbon build up. I highly recommend this kit but it may be overkill for those who already have some cleaning gear and/or only a limited number/type of weapons.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Otis Elite
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t use it for cleaning yet, but so far impressed with the set packaging and overall presentation. This product is US-made also used by US military, and paying a few bucks extra (than lower-quality Chinese brands) certainly pays off. I may update this review after first cleaning if there are issues but right now I am happy with 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: B3B3A6AC74ECBD56BCDBEFA4799FB9DF

customer_reviews.title: WOW
customer_reviews.text: This seems to have everything you would ever need. No have not gone and tried all but what I did and seen I must say that I am very happy, or more than happy. I did add some other items I use to it to make to me a perfect kit. I wish I had time to tell all and give it a proper review but may soon do.
customer_reviews.author: nmac

customer_reviews.title: Works great and lasts a long time
customer_reviews.text: Kit works very well. Purchased in 2012 and is still going strong. Do not make the mistake of using too large of a patch because if you get that thing stuck in the barrel, it's very difficult to get it out since you can't just get a rod on the other side and press it out.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen H.

customer_reviews.title: Meh at best cleaning kit
customer_reviews.text: Been fairly disappointed in this cleaning kit. It has brushes and cables and such, but the whole thing just comes across as cheap. I end up using a much smaller and much less expensive kit far more often. The travel cleaning kit that came with it was nice, but I’d go with something else next time.
customer_reviews.author: Keith Kernes

customer_reviews.title: get this if you're fancy
customer_reviews.text: cuz this kit is pretty fancy. your gun can be cleaned for pretty cheap. But if you want to look like you have ALL the stuff, this kit has it all. Although now there are even fancier ones, with polished wooden cases no less. But this will clean everything you own, other than maybe howitzers and tanks.
customer_reviews.author: Arbab Khan

customer_reviews.title: A good field kit, but overpriced
customer_reviews.text: I'll be the first to admit this is the best field kit I've found online that could be shipped to Afghanistan. It has everything needed for M9 and M4 and then some. When I go home, I'll take it and use it to clean my vast arsenal of zombie apocalypse guns. I do think this kit should be sold for about 20% less, and the intrepid shopped could buy a fishing tackle box and assemble the individual parts for less. The carry bag is well made and convenient for throwing in a backpack though. I don't use the included oil (another cost savings if I had assembled myself) because I prefer. Overall, this kit is of excellent quality.
customer_reviews.author: Penfist

customer_reviews.title: Great for beginners and advanced alike
customer_reviews.text: This is a great cleaning kit for beginners and a great to-go case for more experienced shooters. This has everything you need to start cleaning and maintaining your firearms. This makes a great gift to any hunter in your life. I would definitely recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Rehfeld

customer_reviews.title: Difenetly a great kit.
customer_reviews.text: Finally broke down and spent the cash for one. Should of ordered it years ago. Quick and easy to use once you figure everything out and get the hang of it. I've cleaned at least 15 different calibers and done pistols, rifles, and shotguns.Works great my last cleaning kit.
customer_reviews.author: Todd Shriver

customer_reviews.title: All you need.
customer_reviews.text: I use a large tackle box to hold my cleaning supplies so the first thing I did was empty the bag out and toss it. This is a great kit but the bag it comes it would make it hard to find what you need.
customer_reviews.author: Scotty D.

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic all-in-one kit.
customer_reviews.text: I own a variety of modern and milsurp pistols and rifles in a multitude of calibers, and my old Hoppe's kit was not cutting it at all. Because I'm a cheapskate, a lot of my ammo is also corrosive, and my guns need to be stripped, flushed out, and cleaned almost immediately after use. Very, very happy with this kit, everything is well-made and durable, the case will hold everything in place while doing some pretty gnarly offroading. Expensive, but the only kit you'll ever need.
customer_reviews.author: Connor

customer_reviews.title: great cleaning kit.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent design and layout of tools. All brushes are high quality. I havent tried to cleaner solution yet because i use mpro7 and hoppes, but im sure it works well. The bag it came in seems to be well made and the tactical cleaning kit that comes with it is great to take to the range. I have various firearms ranging from 9mm to 7.62x54r and i can clean them all with this kit. It was a god send for cleaning my mini 14 which is impossible to clean from breach to muzzle with a solid cleaning rod. I firmly believe it was worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: john522

customer_reviews.title: Great kit.
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful kit, American made, packs well. Actually only complaint is the instructions, wish they were a bit larger and better put together for understanding.
customer_reviews.author: Charles Dillistone

customer_reviews.title: Would be lost without it
customer_reviews.text: It took me a while to get used to the Otis over using the "standard" type of kit for all of my life up til now. Now I can't imagine not having it. Being the Elite system, it has the accessories for every type of gun I need to clean. The only negative that I have is that there is little space to add extra(bigger) bottles of cleaner and oil. It will hold them in the pockets but that puts everything in a bit of a tight squeeze. Aside from that I am very pleased with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Colsrob

customer_reviews.title: this system is great
customer_reviews.text: use the smaller patches [sometimes 2 at once/ can't use 1/2 of a big one]. the solvent/lube is a great concept and does clean well, as a lube it is not a strong smell that lingers. i will buy a few more pcs. so my small pouch can stay away from my kit. the kit is over done but with quality components,if i get; 1- .22 loop, 1- .30 loop, 1- 12ga loop, 1- lg. cable and 1 tapered handle. my field kit can stand alone and my home kit will remain complete [needing to be restocked w/small patches and ultra-bore as needed, and is sure to serve me well].
customer_reviews.author: mike h. (this i no i spelt rite)

customer_reviews.title: comprehensive cleaning system
customer_reviews.text: if you are like me you have a drawer full of cleaning tools that you don't use or bits and pieces of things that you cant find. This cleaning system, and it is a system, rethinks the process of cleaning a gun. why do I need metal rods? why can't I use a cable to PULL the cleaning wad through the barrell? Otis has re-thought the process of cleaning a gun. They have also made the parts that you use of a very high quality instead of those little plastic pieces that bend and break. Very well thought out system. Even comes with a travel cleaning kit for hunting trips or the range.
customer_reviews.author: S. George

customer_reviews.title: He loves the cord system but still feels having both is better. For a variety of guns it works awesome ...
customer_reviews.text: Got this as a Christmas present for my husband, he loves all the supplies that it comes with. He loves the cord system but still feels having both is better. For a variety of guns it works awesome but the bag leaves a lot to be desired but have seen a few gun lovers that use tackle boxes so probably go that way. So a few more pieces and a better carrying system but still makes a great place to start a full kit for an every gun cleaning kit.
customer_reviews.author: Christian D

customer_reviews.title: Awesome kit!
customer_reviews.text: I gathered up twenty years of gun cleaning tools/supplies hodge-podge I had accumulated and threw it all in the trash, replacing it with this kit from Otis. Everything you need in one neat package. It made me wonder why I hadn't done it sooner. I recommend you do it too--you'll be a happier person.
customer_reviews.author: AtlantaMan

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT WASTE YOUR MONEY ON CHEAP GUN CLEANERS
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT WASTE YOUR MONEY ON CHEAP GUN CLEANERS.......YOU AND I HAVE BIG BUCKS IN OUR WEAPONS.... SO BUY THE CLEANING KIT THEY DESERVE...COST MORE BUT ARE WORTH IT...NO BORE WEAR IF PROPERLY USED.....WILL COVER MOST OF WEAPONS ALOT OF US OWN.....YOU WILL NOT BE DISAPPOINTED....MAKE SURE YOU USE OTIS PATCHES....ABSOLUTLY THE BEST IF PROPERLY ATTACHED TO CLEANING JAG...SEE U TUBE FOR INSTRUCTIONS.....DEAD SHOT MIKE
customer_reviews.author: Mike G.

customer_reviews.title: If you have multiple calibers of firearms...
customer_reviews.text: This kit has everything. A lot of reviewers said it was overpriced and just to buy the pieces you need, but that would not have worked for us. We have two .40 caliber weapons, one 30-06, one .357, and one 12 gauge. Buying all the different tools necessary for cleaning plus pads, oil, cleaner, etc. would have cost us much more than this one kit (I checked). It's also great to have the large case, as well as the compact round case for outings like hunting trips where all the extras aren't needed.
customer_reviews.author: R Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Good All Around Kit
customer_reviews.text: This is a GREAT kit for covering a variety of guns. It's put together nicely and can be very handy as an all in one cleaning kit.
customer_reviews.author: leo900mso

customer_reviews.title: No information on how to use kit
customer_reviews.text: It's a great kit would earn 5 stars but has absolutely no guidance on how or what to use in kit very very vague
customer_reviews.author: fred willey

customer_reviews.title: Overall this is a good kit, like most the other reviews say the ...
customer_reviews.text: Overall this is a good kit, like most the other reviews say the case that it comes in is a little cheap, but I'll just use it until I can't. then I'll buy a tackle box or something and assemble a box for cleaning equipment. I really like the cable system, and their patches are pretty ingenious If you think about it, you are getting the small Otis kit included with this so that's a 40$ value right there. I put the small kit in my range bag and leave the big case at home. I am very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Kit, will definitely buy again when needed.
customer_reviews.text: If this had hard rods this would be the end-all-be-all kit. I am extremely satisfied and this kit will assist you cleaning any gun in your arsenal.
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin S. Hanson

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the money
customer_reviews.text: The best cleaning kit I have ever bought. For the money totally worth it, you won’t need anything else and this kit will last a very long time. Made in USA and quality made.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice variety
customer_reviews.text: After looking around for months, I decided to go for this. I may not use every caliber that comes with the set, but for the money I would definitely choose this over any other. I have yet to have use this set, but believe it will work great. I would definitely repurchase this set if i could go back. However, just as others have stated, it seems like the company could have used a better case. Just as another reviewer stated, I plan to go and get a cheap little tackle box to organize and carry all of the items in the cleaning set.
customer_reviews.author: Jared M

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: This kit while expensive is actually a good value in the long run. If you own several different rifles and handgun calibers this kit will likely contain everything you need to clean without having spend three times as much money to buy each item individually. Each item is of good quality as is the storage case.
customer_reviews.author: manmade

customer_reviews.title: This kit has everything you could ever need to clean ...
customer_reviews.text: This kit has everything you could ever need to clean all of your guns. I use it to clean pistols, rifles, ARs, shotguns, you name it. I even use it to clean my chainsaw. ha ha. Buy this kit and you'll be set on keeping your guns well maintained and oiled so that you're ready when the Zombie apocalypse happens!
customer_reviews.author: Dustin Ortmann

customer_reviews.title: A great cleaning kit. Everything you'd ever need.
customer_reviews.text: This kit has everything you could possibly need to clean your firearms. The coated cable pull through beats the brass rod hands down in my opinion. There are three tunes of oil included with this kit so it'll last for a long time. It's good oil, I still prefer Hoppes #9 though. The kit bag is well made and is compact enough to fit in my range bag. There are enough patches to last me a very long time. I would recommend Otis products to anyone serious about keeping their firearms clean.
customer_reviews.author: Brad M.

customer_reviews.title: Love this complete cleaning kit!
customer_reviews.text: The kit is easy to use and can cover a very broad range of firearms. Great for at home or on the range. It also includes several extraction tools.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy Walton

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband. He really likes it and said the kit is a very good quality. However, he thinks the case could be better.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie L Mack

customer_reviews.title: ok
customer_reviews.text: It's nice to have everything for a lot of different firearms but after having it and using for sometime now I'm not that impressed. The pull through cables and patches are just a slow pain the butt for anything that you don't absolutely have to have them on. I much prefer a good carbon/fiberglass rod, so much quicker and easier. even If you have to do some disassembly to use a rod I prefer it. wouldn't buy again.
customer_reviews.author: J. G.

customer_reviews.title: Great for beginners
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my first rifle and it works spectacular with a little bit of practice. The instructions were clear and simple to follow.
customer_reviews.author: Matt DePersiis

customer_reviews.title: Otis cleaning
customer_reviews.text: This unit takes a bit of getting used to if all you have used are the cleaning rods before. But, once you are accustomed to this units operation, you will love it. Easy to use and does not spread cleaning solvents into the breech area where it can be hard to clean out. This kit comes with everything that one will need to clean their guns for years to come. Thge only things extra to buy will be cleaning patches, solvents, and gun oil/lubricants. A must have for the serious shooter.
customer_reviews.author: Friar

customer_reviews.title: Very good cleaning kit
customer_reviews.text: Very nice cleaning kit. It's got just about everything you need to get the job done.
customer_reviews.author: Audrey Rossi

customer_reviews.title: Not too bad
customer_reviews.text: This has way more brushes then I need but it is an ideal cleaning kit. I especially love the smaller one that comes with this that I can load up with just the items I need to take to the range in my range bag. The ONLY thing missing in this whole great kit would be a tube of gun grease. That is the only bad thing I can say. I would replace this if I needed to and would easily recommend this to family and friends, A great, great bargain.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Bockenkamp

customer_reviews.title: awesome
customer_reviews.text: made in usa, lifetime warranty, all parts included plus some. you cant go wrong, seriously
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this kit
customer_reviews.text: Love this kit. Has everything I need to maintain variety of firearms.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Christopher

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Last cleaning kit you will ever buy.
customer_reviews.text: Has everything you could possibly need to deep clean firearms. The soft case is not great. I recommend using a tackle box for storing all the utensils. The tools are very high quality and the instructions are a great help.
customer_reviews.author: molly

customer_reviews.title: Otis Elite Cleaning System
customer_reviews.text: An exceptional value in a firearms cleaning kit! This Otis Cleaning Kit has everything you need for all your firearms cleaning requirements. Otis developed the pull through gun cleaning technique to its highest level yet a truely professional package that has it all. Everything you need in one kit for any firearm you will encounter. A valuable and highly developed kit for every firearms enthusiast. The best and most comprehensive cleaning kit out there and the best overall value for all this kit contains. It literally has everything you will need!
customer_reviews.author: JT

customer_reviews.title: So many uses! So many guns! So much cleaning!
customer_reviews.text: I have cleaned my arsenal of 11 firearms (7 long guns, 4 handguns) countless times over with this kit. I am going to have to buy replacement pads, bristle brush, and oil/solvent here soon but all in all this kit is amazing and I am so happy I bought this. It having all the calibers I need and the pulley/cable cleaning system/technique makes cleaning my guns after a day at the range a blast and as expedient as possible.
customer_reviews.author: VanillaGorilla

customer_reviews.title: Every thing in one package
customer_reviews.text: Ease of use. Cleaned every firearm in my gun safe and it worked on all from ar’s to shotguns to rifles, pistols & blackpowder firearms
customer_reviews.author: LPKV24

customer_reviews.title: Nice cleaning kit
customer_reviews.text: Nice cleaning product, all bases covered in the cleaning area.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Burton

customer_reviews.title: Everything you need
customer_reviews.text: Husband got this and absolutely loves it, has all the sizes that you could possibly need to clean your fire arms. Very nice kit.
customer_reviews.author: Abby

customer_reviews.title: Very nice kit, there is nothing i have that this ...
customer_reviews.text: Very nice kit, there is nothing i have that this kit does not address, even laser sights and pellet rifles, Love the organization tubes and pockets .Very good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas D Costello

customer_reviews.title: perfect complete base kit
customer_reviews.text: Best overall base kit to cover all calibers... better then water and ibuprofen..
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Really good accessories
customer_reviews.text: I use this all the time to clean multiple gauges and I really like it. The flexible cleaner could be better though.
customer_reviews.author: Chris S.

customer_reviews.title: The Ultimate Gun Cleaning Set
customer_reviews.text: I feel like The Most Interesting Man in the World with this set - "I don't always clean guns but when I do I use the Otis Elite Cleaning System." I haven't run into any snags whatsoever. I've cleaned multiple guns (.22, 300 Win, .50DE, 8mm mauser, 9mm, .40, 30-06, AK-47, shotguns) now with this set. All of the tools within the set are high quality - I haven't broken any yet, and they don't feel like they're going to break. Overall, I love it!
customer_reviews.author: L. Jensen

customer_reviews.title: Greeeeeeaaaaat
customer_reviews.text: Great product everything is labeled make it easy for a beginner to figure it out ive cleaned alot of guns in my time and having everything labeled and neatly stored makes it so much easier
customer_reviews.author: Earl Crain

customer_reviews.title: The best gun cleaning kit
customer_reviews.text: Has everything you could ever want to clean a firearm.
customer_reviews.author: Tanner H.

customer_reviews.title: The ULTIMATE !
customer_reviews.text: AWESOME WELL DESIGNED CLEANING KIT ! Perfect for any cleaning job .
customer_reviews.author: M. Ray

customer_reviews.title: Decent kit, might need to invest in a carring case
customer_reviews.text: I just received the Otis Elite kit and for the most part I love it. Only complaint I have so far is for the price I paid I expected the carrying case to last at least a little. Apparently it couldn't even make in through shipping and I have a large tear where on a pocket zipper. It seems the stitching just came undone.
customer_reviews.author: Ray Hamilton

customer_reviews.title: Has everything you need!! Best kit I've ever purchased.
customer_reviews.text: I was able to use this item right out of the box. My weapons needed cleaning and I was able to clean them with no issues. This kit is amazing it has everything I need to keep my guns and rifle clean for years to come.
customer_reviews.author: CosmicRay

customer_reviews.title: Great kit
customer_reviews.text: This kit is great. It has everything you need to clean with but I did add the bore snake they have as well. The only thing I would like to have seen is a bigger CLP oil or a cleaning one with a LP oil. I have recommended this kit to friends who have recommended to their friends
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Roe

customer_reviews.title: Best quality.
customer_reviews.text: You get what you pay for. Quality product that’s been trusted across industries.
customer_reviews.author: Aidan Hart

customer_reviews.title: Everything you need and more
customer_reviews.text: This has a great selection of brushes and duplicates of coming gauges and calibers. It is a great kit if you use a wide variety of guns. The portable pouch is great too. I throw that in the pistol bag for when I am at the range and need to quick clean out a barrel.
customer_reviews.author: KALVO

customer_reviews.title: Husbands Chrismas gift. He is super happy with it
customer_reviews.text: I'm a intermediate gun owner and already own a cleaning kit but I've never like using the poles. Bought it for my husband but we will both be using it. Selling points were reviews from gentlemen will many years of gin ownership expressing their like for this system and no poles.
customer_reviews.author: Catalog Shopper

customer_reviews.title: The do it all cleaning kit
customer_reviews.text: Everything you need to clean you rifle, pistol, and shotgun. Worked well and did a great job, and in a good carrying case. Wouldn’t take anything for it
customer_reviews.author: Phil B.

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: This is a must have for anybody who has firearms. Spend the extra money and get this one because your basically getting 2 kids. It comes in the bag as seen in the picture but you also get the original Otis gun cleaning kit.... you know the small puck shape one. So you can have the big bag at home and throw the little puck in your range bag. The quality of this product is unmatched
customer_reviews.author: jbar

customer_reviews.title: This is by far the best cleaning kit I have ever owned!
customer_reviews.text: This is by far the best cleaning kit I have ever owned! Has everything that is needed to clean any type of firearm you have. Kit is very simple to use and the carry case makes it easy to carry around. The little kit inside makes taking to the range easy also. Would recommend any gun owner to buy this cleaning kit!
customer_reviews.author: JG

customer_reviews.title: This is a BEST BUY (no pun intended)
customer_reviews.text: This kit is excellent. The case alone could be sold separately for at least $19.99. Good assortment of cleaning tools (you can add your own oils, cleaning liquids, solvents etc.) and even materials to clean your Optics (ah my darling Scope). I've seen this exact kit in a local gun dealer's store for $20.00 more. Get this kit, remove the included items & tools and place them in your usual Gun Cleaning Box and give the Case to your favorite Lady. You'll win twice.
customer_reviews.author: Evan A. Richardson

customer_reviews.title: QUALITY CLEANING KIT
customer_reviews.text: This cleaning kit is well put together with everything you need to clean just about all your weapons. Easy to take a long to the range. The only reason I didn't give it five stars is that I'm not 100% sold on "cable" type cleaning systems. Still prefer my cleaning rods and bore guides for home use. Case constuction and "parts" included are top quailty.
customer_reviews.author: Ole Whiskers

customer_reviews.title: I would suggest buying a higher quality cleaning pad but other than that it's a wonderful tool for our guns
customer_reviews.text: We've used it multiple times. The cleaning pads that come in the kit tend to leave lint in the barrel. I would suggest buying a higher quality cleaning pad but other than that it's a wonderful tool for our guns.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: A comprehensive gun cleaning kit in regards to the brushes, cables, and small tools you will find included. Even includes an optics cleaning kit. A bit pricey.....maybe. Care about your hardware? Get this kit, you won't be disappointed. Quality kit made in America.
customer_reviews.author: Sgt. Moe

customer_reviews.title: Extremely efficient weapon cleaning from air rifle to big bore shotgun!
customer_reviews.text: I am very surprised at how efficient this system is to use. After one use it is completely intuitive and I keep asking myself why didn't I think of this? I am not saying that having a rod system is completely obsolete, but you will use if very little if at all. The patch system they have is also so convenient compared to other bore jags and the like. I absolutely love it and am also excited to be able to take it to the range and do my cleaning before I even head home.
customer_reviews.author: Go Navy!

customer_reviews.title: used for years
customer_reviews.text: no idea when i bought this but its gone with me on multiple trips to the field, range, and deployments, its held up great all these years. i will be ordering more equipment in the near future.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas M.

customer_reviews.title: Great kit
customer_reviews.text: very nice cleaning kit, Bought it for a friend for his birthday and think I will buy one for myself.
customer_reviews.author: Jim H.

customer_reviews.title: Everything you'll need
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this because I have several guns in different calibers. It is probably more than I need, but oh well. It comes with a nice case, although I think I may upgrade to a tool or tackle box. Not sure if I'd pay the same price for another I just happened to have the extra cash at the time.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffery Lee Hein

customer_reviews.title: I love this cleaning kit
customer_reviews.text: I love this cleaning kit. If you are a pro or novice at cleaning weapons, you will love this kit. It's well organized and has everything that I need for a pistol or long gun.
customer_reviews.author: David Eakles

customer_reviews.title: Great go to bag and travel kit.
customer_reviews.text: Wow, when the description said it had it all they weren't kidding. I really enjoy the soft case that allows me to slip in an extra bottle of whatever or a pistol to take on a break-in session. Lightweight and well organized. So, what do I do with all my other kits?
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Inventor

customer_reviews.title: most of it is there
customer_reviews.text: large assortment do not like running cable thru my bore threw that away right off
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Huff

customer_reviews.title: good kit
customer_reviews.text: good kit, but I don't like the snake wire. I much prefer the rods. comes with everything you would need except more cleaning fluid like CLP to clean many different guns. it's a little bulky to carry, but comes with handles built into the bag.
customer_reviews.author: C. F.

customer_reviews.title: Happy to say that this cleaning kit is amazing
customer_reviews.text: Happy to say that this cleaning kit is amazing, It has a bunch of cool gadgets, everything is labeled neatly, the case is light and well put together. Keep up the good work Team Otis!!!
customer_reviews.author: Mike Moccia

customer_reviews.title: The best for all my guns.
customer_reviews.text: Everything I need is in this one kit. I'm happy that it is made in America with pride.
customer_reviews.author: Kurtis

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I like this cleaning kit. But wish it also had a brass rod to go with it.
customer_reviews.author: Ralph

customer_reviews.title: which was fine since I elected to buy a big fishing tackle ...
customer_reviews.text: Showed up with a torn case, which was fine since I elected to buy a big fishing tackle box to organize and store it all, which worked out perfectly. Looks like all well made stuff ... but the case sucks.
customer_reviews.author: Johnny Boy

customer_reviews.title: Great product! Pretty much every brush you need. Wish they would add a chamber brush for ARs!!
customer_reviews.text: I received this kit several months ago and use it to clean a variety of weapons. I read other reviews that state the parts are cheaply made (mostly bad threads) and the tools feel like they are flimsy. I have not seen any signs so far that would indicate cheap manufacturing of poor quality control. The bag could be better, but it's not horrible. The only brush not included in the kit that I need is a chamber brush for ARs. Going to get my buddy one for his birthday.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great all inclusive cleaning kit
customer_reviews.text: Great all inclusive cleaning kit. This, with a few additions, will be all I will ever need for all my weapons. Very nice bag and very well organized. Recommend this for all shooters, especially for someone just starting to get set up. This has everything you will initially need. I wish I had started out with this years ago..
customer_reviews.author: ALEXANDER A.

customer_reviews.title: Best gun cleaning kit I have every used
customer_reviews.text: Best gun cleaning kit I have every used. Has more pieces than I really need, but i was tired of buying individual pieces every time I added something to my collection. The tactical kit is realistically more than enough.
customer_reviews.author: Charles

customer_reviews.title: Everything that was advertised and a great deal for the only kit you will ever need
customer_reviews.text: Outstanding cleaning kit! Everything that was advertised and a great deal for the only kit you will ever need. My one request would be to have an attachment/handle for the cables to assist in pulling the brushes through the bore. This kit has every attachment and accessory needed for every firearm that I own.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Otis Cleaning Kit
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product!! Most gunsmiths will advise you to clean from the chamber to the muzzle when all possible. This to prevent damage to the crown at the end of the barrel which helps in the accuracy of the bullet. This product does just that. Also the pricing of this outfit with the rebate made this product the deal of the month for me!! Thanks Otis
customer_reviews.author: Mountainman

customer_reviews.title: The best
customer_reviews.text: Very nice! My second unit! 15 years. Better then any others I have tried. One kit does most!!
customer_reviews.author: jim Spratt

customer_reviews.title: Pretty much anything and everything you will ever need to ...
customer_reviews.text: Pretty much anything and everything you will ever need to clean your weapons, great kit and love the travel kit included. I have bought a few for friends for gifts and they swear buy it, best investment I have made in the cleaning department.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Customer

customer_reviews.title: Has it all
customer_reviews.text: I've got it covered with this kit. It has all the doo dads necessary to clean all my pistols and rifles. I especially like the cables to clean the barrels. It's so much easier and efficient than rods. If you don't know what you are doing, there are dummy sheets to help. Definitely worth the price!
customer_reviews.author: RJ Elrod

customer_reviews.title: Storage bag appears to made of low quality material and craftsmanship
customer_reviews.text: The bag was torn at a seam when I removed it from the box. That problem right off the bat didn't help my first impression of Otis products. The storage bag appears to made of low quality material and craftsmanship. I had to purchase a Plano Tackle Box to store the kit in because of the large rip in the seam of the included storage bag. The Otis cleaning products in the kit appear to be of good quality materials. I just wish that for the money they would furnish a storage bag of decent quality.
customer_reviews.author: Carol Picton

customer_reviews.title: By far the best cleaning kit I have ever bought
customer_reviews.text: By far the best cleaning kit I have ever bought. I have not found a gun I couldn't clean with this kit and I have a few. You wont be disappointed. Compact and portable perfect to take with you.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

product_meta.title: Otis Technology The Otis Elite
product_meta.description:
The Otis Elite is the most innovative gun cleaning system in the Otis line of products. Suitable for an armorer but used by thousands, the Otis Elite is designed to maintain all rifles 17 to 50 caliber, pistols 17 to 50 caliber, shotguns 410 to 12 AND10 gauge, and all in line muzzleloaders. The Otis Elite contains the world famous item 750 Tactical cleaning system and the entire line of bronze bore and chamber cleaning brushes from 17 caliber through 10 gauge. Also included are six memory flex cleaning rods, an all purpose nylon receiver brush, a T-handle bar, three slotted tips, obstruction removers, small and large patch Savers, a bore reflector/flag safety, small caliber and all-caliber 100% cotton patches, and two 5 oz. Tubes of Otis O85 ultra bore solvent. All items store neatly in a black nylon, rust proof case. Case has a lock and keys for additional security. The Otis Elite now includes the brass Scraper tool set. With over 40 gun cleaning components, the Otis Elite is the hallmark of excellence in firearm maintenance.

AMAZON.COM


The most innovative gun cleaning system in the Otis line, the Otis Elite is suitable for an armorer but used by thousands. The Elite is designed to maintain all rifles from .17 to .50 caliber, pistols from .17 to .50 caliber, shotguns from .410 to 12/10 gauge, and all inline muzzleloaders. There's no better way to keep your weapons collection performing like new. The Otis Elite starts with the world-famous 750 Tactical Cleaning System, which includes an entire line of bronze bore and chamber cleaning brushes. Also included in the cleaning system are six Memory-Flex cleaning rods, an all-purpose nylon receiver brush, a T-handle bar, three slotted tips, obstruction removers, small and large Patch Savers, a bore reflector/flag safety, small caliber and all-caliber 100-percent cotton patches, and two 5-ounce tubes of Otis O85 Ultra Bore solvent.
feature_bullets: Cleans all rifles/pistols/shotguns/inline muzzleloaders with 100% cotton 2” & 3” patches, 3 slotted tips & 2 patch savers

16 firearm specific bronze bore brushes with size marked on brush stem (.17, .22 limited breech, .22/.223, .243-.260, .270/7mm, .30-06/.300/30-30/.308, .338-.35, .357-38cal/9mm, .40/10mm, .44/.45, .50cal, .410ga, 28ga, 20ga, 16ga, 12/10ga)
8”, 12” and 36” aircraft grade Memory-Flex cables and thread connector for proper Breech-to-Muzzle cleaning
Small & large obstruction removers knock out mud, snow, stuck casings and double as a t-handle base for included t-handle; small t-handle & stud included for small caliber cleaning
.223cal/5.56mm chamber brush, pin punch, end brush, straight pick, locking lug scraper, scraper, short AP brush, double end AP brush and male & female rod for more precise cleaning
Lens tissue, lens spray, lens brush and lens cloth for optics care
Complete Tactical cleaning kit in compact soft pack cases included with 6 brushes, 3 cables, 2” & 3” patches, 0.5 fl.oz. Bio-CLP, chamber flag
No Nonsense Warranty, Made in the USA
Six (6) Memory-Flex Cables of varying length for effective and correct Breech-to-Muzzle cleaning

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item is not eligible for international shipping.
